Public Delegate Function XmlValueGetter() As Object
type XmlValueGetter = delegate of unit -> obj

Docs.summary: A used by the class to pass attribute, text, and white space values as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute, text, or white space.
Docs.returns: An object containing the attribute, text, or white space value. The object is a CLR type that that corresponds to the XSD type of the attribute, text, or white space value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter>`delegate` is useful if the CLR value of an attribute, text, or white space node is already available, and avoids the cost of converting it to a `string` and then reparsing it again for validation.
For more information about the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md) topic, or the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class reference documentation.
